hudId.description: The login identifier of the reviewer; the user's HID.

nameLast.description: The family name of the reviewer.

remainingCapacity.description: The remaining number of reviews the reviewer can have assigned to them.

locationId.description: The ID of the geographical location where the reviewer does the review.

reportsTo.description: The ID of the person who the reviewer reports to.

statusCode.description: Status of the user; whether they are active (A), inactive (I), or terminated (T).
